snippet.title: Super Sami Roll - Official Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Help Sami rescue his friend Vera in this colorful and exhilarating 3D platformer with fast rolling, air-grappling tongue action and tons of locations and enemies!
 
Releasing on PS5, Switch, XBSX, XB1, and Steam in 2021

Steam ► https://store.steampowered.com/app/1554640/Super_Sami_Roll/

■ Colorful and eye-catching environments, characters and enemies
■ Dozens upon dozens of unique levels
■ Exciting grappling tongue action!
■ Character customization
■ A combination of painstakingly hand-crafted pixel art and modern 3D graphics
■ Tons of secrets including awesome unlockable modes (even a multiplayer one!)
■ Progressive difficulty that has been fine-tuned to keep you engaged until you become a master!
■ An amazing soundtrack that will leave you wanting to keep on listening!

Twitter ► https://twitter.com/supersamiroll
Discord ► https://discord.gg/UjqssfJK5U
